mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue( id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address ) values( #{id}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{owner}, #{company}, #{job}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{website}, #{mphone}, #{state}, #{source}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_clue c join tbl_user u on u.id = c.owner
c.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%' or c.appellation like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and c.company like '%' #{company} '%'
and c.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and c.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and c.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and c.state like '%' #{state} '%'

select c.id, c.fullname, c.appellation, c.company, c.phone, c.source, u.name as owner, c.mphone, c.state from tbl_clue c join tbl_user u on u.id = c.owner
c.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%' or c.appellation like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and c.company like '%' #{company} '%'
and c.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and c.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and c.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and c.state like '%' #{state} '%'
order by c.createTime desc limit #{skipCount},#{pageSize}

select u.name as owner, c.id, c.fullname, c.appellation, c.company, c.job, c.email, c.phone, c.website, c.mphone, c.state, c.source, c.createBy, c.createTime, c.editBy, c.editTime, c.description, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.address from tbl_user u join tbl_clue c on u.id = c.owner where c.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_clue set fullname=#{fullname}, appellation=#{appellation}, owner=#{owner}, company=#{company}, job=#{job}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, website=#{website}, mphone=#{mphone}, state=#{state}, source=#{source}, editBy=#{editBy}, editTime=#{editTime}, description=#{description}, contactSummary=#{contactSummary}, nextContactTime=#{nextContactTime}, address=#{address} where id = #{id}
